entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 04:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
